WelcomeMessage.Name: Welcome Message
WelcomeMessage.Title: Welcome to NBAdb Toolbox!
WelcomeMessage.Text: Click the 'Create Server/Db Connection' to get started

EditCreatePopupExplanation.Name: Edit Create Popup Explanation
EditCreatePopupExplanation.Title: Connection Configuration Guide
EditCreatePopupExplanation.Text:
Server: The name or public IP address of the server you'll be connecting to
Server Alias: A nickname for the server to display on UI
Database: Name of Database we will create or connect to
 Create Db: If checked, we will attempt to create the database. If not, we will try to connect first
 Set as Default Db: If checked, Toolbox will connect to this Server/Db on Launch
 Use Windows Auth: Connect to the server with your windows login
Username: If using a SQL Server logon, enter user and password. If Windows Auth, no entry

BuildDatabaseWalkthrough.Name: Build Database Walkthrough
BuildDatabaseWalkthrough.Title: Next Step: Build Database
BuildDatabaseWalkthrough.Text: Click 'Build Database' next! We'll connect to the server and create the Db from master.

DatabaseUtilitiesIntro.Name: Database Utilities Intro
DatabaseUtilitiesIntro.Title: Database Utilities Features
DatabaseUtilitiesIntro.Text: On the left you'll find Database Utilites, home to our Overview and Options sections

DatabaseOverviewIntro.Name: Database Overview Intro
DatabaseOverviewIntro.Title: Database Overview
DatabaseOverviewIntro.Text:
Click anywhere on the Database Overview panel to maximize or minimize display.
When maximized, it shows:
 Which seasons are populated or not
 Game/Entity and Row count by Table
 'Season Status', which tells us which (if any) tables are missing data

DatabaseOptionsPopulate.Name: Database Options Populate
DatabaseOptionsPopulate.Title: Database Options - Populate Db
DatabaseOptionsPopulate.Text: Select any enabled Season(s) and click Populate to begin data insertion process

DatabaseOptionsRefresh.Name: Database Options Refresh
DatabaseOptionsRefresh.Title: Database Options - Refresh Data
DatabaseOptionsRefresh.Text: Instead of reloading all season data, refresh current season with any games played since last insert by clicking 'Refresh Data'

DatabaseOptionsDownload.Name: Database Options Download
DatabaseOptionsDownload.Title: Database Options - Download Data Files
DatabaseOptionsDownload.Text:
To enable more seasons, first download their respective Data Files by clicking 'Download'
Files are downloaded from the program's github repo and stored in your program's Content/Historic Data folder

DatabaseOptionsRepair.Name: Database Options Repair
DatabaseOptionsRepair.Title: Database Options - Repair Data
DatabaseOptionsRepair.Text: If the game/entity or row count doesn't match the expected values, click 'Repair Db' to populate any missing data

DatabaseOptionsMovement.Name: Database Options Movement
DatabaseOptionsMovement.Title: Database Options - Player Movement
DatabaseOptionsMovement.Text:
Populates all Player Transactions since 07/01/2015.
Includes all Trades, Signings and Waives.
Pulled from NBA Player Movement endpoint.
